title: FS - Evers Chicago on Shirt PSA
author: Moose117

posts.post_title: FS - Evers Chicago on Shirt PSA
posts.post_content:
T206 Evers Chicago on Shirt PSA 2.5 

Beautiful example with excellent centering and crisp, clear coloring. 

Also the faint hint of an ink transfer on the back. Looks like this was stacked on another Evers, and it picked up the bat and some of his sleeve/belt.

SOLD
